# HF.EHR.Pheno

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of HF.EHR.Pheno is to collate Electronic Health Records (EHR) phenotyping data for heart
failure.

## Installation

You can install the development version of HF.EHR.Pheno like so:

```{r install}
remotes::install_github("nicksunderland/..... TBC")
```
